017package org.apache.bcel;
018
019/**
020 * Exception constants.
021 *
022 * @deprecated (since 6.0) DO NOT USE - use ExceptionConst instead
023 */
024@Deprecated
025public interface ExceptionConstants {
026
027    /**
028     * The mother of all exceptions
029     */
030    Class<Throwable> THROWABLE = Throwable.class;
031    /**
032     * Super class of any run-time exception
033     */
034    Class<RuntimeException> RUNTIME_EXCEPTION = RuntimeException.class;
035    /**
036     * Super class of any linking exception (aka Linkage Error)
037     */
038    Class<LinkageError> LINKING_EXCEPTION = LinkageError.class;
039    /**
040     * Linking Exceptions
041     */
042    Class<ClassCircularityError> CLASS_CIRCULARITY_ERROR = ClassCircularityError.class;
043    Class<ClassFormatError> CLASS_FORMAT_ERROR = ClassFormatError.class;
044    Class<ExceptionInInitializerError> EXCEPTION_IN_INITIALIZER_ERROR = ExceptionInInitializerError.class;
045    Class<IncompatibleClassChangeError> INCOMPATIBLE_CLASS_CHANGE_ERROR = IncompatibleClassChangeError.class;
046    Class<AbstractMethodError> ABSTRACT_METHOD_ERROR = AbstractMethodError.class;
047    Class<IllegalAccessError> ILLEGAL_ACCESS_ERROR = IllegalAccessError.class;
048    Class<InstantiationError> INSTANTIATION_ERROR = InstantiationError.class;
049    Class<NoSuchFieldError> NO_SUCH_FIELD_ERROR = NoSuchFieldError.class;
050    Class<NoSuchMethodError> NO_SUCH_METHOD_ERROR = NoSuchMethodError.class;
051    Class<NoClassDefFoundError> NO_CLASS_DEF_FOUND_ERROR = NoClassDefFoundError.class;
052    Class<UnsatisfiedLinkError> UNSATISFIED_LINK_ERROR = UnsatisfiedLinkError.class;
053    Class<VerifyError> VERIFY_ERROR = VerifyError.class;
054    /* UnsupportedClassVersionError is new in JDK 1.2 */
055//    Class UnsupportedClassVersionError = UnsupportedClassVersionError.class;
056    /**
057     * Run-Time Exceptions
058     */
059    Class<NullPointerException> NULL_POINTER_EXCEPTION = NullPointerException.class;
060    Class<ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException> ARRAY_INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS_EXCEPTION = ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.class;
061    Class<ArithmeticException> ARITHMETIC_EXCEPTION = ArithmeticException.class;
062    Class<NegativeArraySizeException> NEGATIVE_ARRAY_SIZE_EXCEPTION = NegativeArraySizeException.class;
063    Class<ClassCastException> CLASS_CAST_EXCEPTION = ClassCastException.class;
064    Class<IllegalMonitorStateException> ILLEGAL_MONITOR_STATE = IllegalMonitorStateException.class;
065
066    /**
067     * Pre-defined exception arrays according to chapters 5.1-5.4 of the Java Virtual Machine Specification
068     *
069     * @deprecated Do not use these arrays, use the static methods in the ExceptionConst implementation class instead
070     */
071    @Deprecated
072    Class<?>[] EXCS_CLASS_AND_INTERFACE_RESOLUTION = {NO_CLASS_DEF_FOUND_ERROR, CLASS_FORMAT_ERROR, VERIFY_ERROR, ABSTRACT_METHOD_ERROR,
073        EXCEPTION_IN_INITIALIZER_ERROR, ILLEGAL_ACCESS_ERROR}; // Chapter 5.1
074    @Deprecated
075    Class<?>[] EXCS_FIELD_AND_METHOD_RESOLUTION = {NO_SUCH_FIELD_ERROR, ILLEGAL_ACCESS_ERROR, NO_SUCH_METHOD_ERROR}; // Chapter 5.2
076
077    /**
078     * Empty array.
079     */
080    @Deprecated
081    Class<?>[] EXCS_INTERFACE_METHOD_RESOLUTION = new Class[0]; // Chapter 5.3 (as below)
082
083    /**
084     * Empty array.
085     */
086    @Deprecated
087    Class<?>[] EXCS_STRING_RESOLUTION = new Class[0];
088    // Chapter 5.4 (no errors but the ones that _always_ could happen! How stupid.)
089    @Deprecated
090    Class<?>[] EXCS_ARRAY_EXCEPTION = {NULL_POINTER_EXCEPTION, ARRAY_INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS_EXCEPTION};
091
092}
